# mal-select



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                       | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `data`   | `data`    | The data for the dropdown options | `any[]`  | `[]`        |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the dropdown          | `string` | `''`        |
| `value`  | `value`   | The currently selected value      | `any`    | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                              | Type               |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `valueChange` | Event emitted when the selection changes | `CustomEvent<any>` |
